amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 109-350 to prohibit the Attorney General from allocating funds under the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program to any state or local government which maintains a "sanctuary policy" in violation of federal law (8 USC 1373). Also requires the Attorney General to report annually to Congress on which state and local governments maintain "sanctuary policies".

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Tancredo amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Tancredo.
